title: The Bud And The Florist - First Time I Wet Myself With Your Fingers...
alternative_title: つぼみと花屋～初めてはあなたの指で濡らして… ; Tsubomi to Hanaya ~ Hajimete wa Anata no Yubi de Nurashite...
status: つぼみと花屋～初めてはあなたの指で濡らして… ; Tsubomi to Hanaya ~ Hajimete wa Anata no Yubi de Nurashite...
description:
Description :
        "Amazing...The scent of flowers and kisses makes my head melt...!"--- Tsubomi, an office worker, has a crush on Akira, a tough florist who frequents the office. However, because of the "mother" character that people tend to rely on, I can't take a step forward... "I'm such a sexy person. I'm not a romantic target." At that point, the chance to be alone with Akira has arrived! Triggered by the sudden touch of hands, Akira changes suddenly! "It's torture if you get wet like this and look at me like that." Akira's long, bony fingers stir my insides.
